data.question: 1. A class is a type of function, but instead of using the keyword function to initiate it, which keyword do we use?
2. What of the following is used in React.js to increase performance?
3. Which of the following acts as the input of a class-based componen
4. Which of the following keyword is used to create a class inheritance?
5. What is the default port where webpack-server runs?
6. How many numbers of elements a valid react component can return?
7. What is the declarative way to render a dynamic list of components based on values in an array?
8. What is the use of webpack command in React.js?
choices: The webpack command is used to transpile all the JavaScript down into one file.
It runs React local development server.

data.question: 9.  Which of the following is used to pass data to a component from outside in React.js?
10. What happens if you render an input element with disabled = {false}?
choices: it will be rendered as enabled
it will be rendered as disabled
it will not rendered at all
data.answer: it will be rendered as enabled
